channel.title: Please help me im really confused
channel.description:
everytime iv put 677 loading 700+ online before the source comes with the cache so when you change the clients ip it gets the cache from your source but iv just updated to a new source and client and for some reason when i put it online to test it for some reason it just sticks on 1% checking for updates.
i havnt really made any changes to the source as im not putting it online for the public just me and a few friends to train at nex. just thought i would add that.
EDIT also the cache works perfectly using 127.0.0.1 but once i change the ips in client.java and loader.java it just doesnt load the cache anymore...

item.title: Please help me im really confused
item.dc:creator: @qtst35 qtst35
item.description:
@qtst35 wrote:

[quote=“iBunnie, post:2, topic:478576”][quote author=qtst35 link=topic=596801.msg4202141#msg4202141 date=1358372437]
everytime iv put 677 loading 700+ online before the source comes with the cache so when you change the clients ip it gets the cache from your source but iv just updated to a new source and client and for some reason when i put it online to test it for some reason it just sticks on 1% checking for updates.

i havnt really made any changes to the source as im not putting it online for the public just me and a few friends to train at nex.
just thought i would add that.

sorry i didnt realise and no he cant connect i thought it might be that i could only connect through 127 but nope

EDIT
also the cache works perfectly using 127.0.0.1 but once i change the ips in client.java and loader.java it just doesnt load the cache anymore…
[/quote]
Does it work for your friends when you change the IP? this would be Client help btw.[/quote]

Read full topic
